Content.Text:
<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have been expecting you. Well? Have you
brought your finest milk?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, so this is the promised milk. Well then, I
shall have my servants fetch us some glasses.
Wait just a moment.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Wait, have you come without the milk? Oh well.
I suppose it's only a postponement of the
inevitable judgment.
